title: Going My Way
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Original Motion Picture Story
description: A young, unconventional priest is assigned to a failing New York parish, where he clashes with the strict, aging pastor while trying to win over the neighborhood youth.

title: Double Indemnity
description: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of his claims investigator friend.

title: Gaslight
description: Years after her aunt was murdered in their London home, a young woman returns to the house with her new husband, who slowly attempts to drive her insane.

title: Laura
description: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating, only to find that the case is far more complex than it seems.

title: Meet Me in St. Louis
description: In the year leading up to the 1904 World's Fair, the four Smith daughters learn lessons of life and love, even as they prepare for a reluctant move to New York.

title: Arsenic and Old Lace
description: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

title: To Have and Have Not
description: During WWII, an American expatriate fishing boat captain in Martinique is coerced into helping the French Resistance.

title: Lifeboat
description: Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the U-boat crew members who sank their ship.

title: National Velvet
description: A jaded former jockey helps a young girl prepare a wild but gifted horse for England's Grand National Sweepstakes.

title: Since You Went Away
description: An epic drama about an American family trying to hold itself together on the home front while the father is away serving in World War II.

title: Wilson
description: A biography of Woodrow Wilson, the 28th President of the United States, covering his political rise and his struggle to establish the League of Nations.

title: The Miracle of Morgan's Creek
description: After a wild send-off party for soldiers, a small-town girl wakes up pregnant and married to a man she can't remember, forcing a local 4-F boy to step in and help.

title: Hail the Conquering Hero
description: Discharged from the Marines for hay fever, a man is afraid to return home until a group of Marines force him to pose as a war hero.

title: Murder, My Sweet
description: Private eye Philip Marlowe is hired by a hulking ex-convict to find his missing girlfriend, leading him into a complex web of blackmail and murder.

title: The Woman in the Window
description: A conservative psychology professor meets a beautiful woman and is inadvertently drawn into a plot of murder and blackmail.

title: Henry V
oscars_won_details: Honorary Award (Laurence Olivier for his outstanding achievement as actor, producer and director)
description: In the midst of the Hundred Years' War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France.

title: The Uninvited
description: A brother and sister purchase a beautiful gothic house on the Cornish coast, only to find it haunted by a tragic past.

title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
description: A dramatization of the Doolittle Raid, the first American retaliatory air strike against Japan during World War II.

title: Cover Girl
description: A nightclub dancer gets a shot at stardom when she wins a contest to be on the cover of a magazine, threatening her relationship with her mentor.

title: Mr. Skeffington
description: A vain and self-absorbed socialite marries a wealthy stockbroker for his money to save her brother from embezzlement charges, but discovers true love too late.

title: Ivan the Terrible, Part I
description: In 16th-century Russia, Ivan IV crowns himself Tsar and attempts to unite the country while facing betrayal from the aristocracy.

title: The Fighting Sullivans
description: Based on a true story, five inseparable brothers from Iowa enlist in the Navy together during WWII, leading to a tragic end.

title: Passage to Marseille
description: Five patriotic convicts escape from Devil's Island to fight for the Free French against the Nazis.

title: The Keys of the Kingdom
description: A Scottish priest establishes a Catholic mission in a remote Chinese province, facing years of struggle, war, and disease.

title: Ministry of Fear
description: Just released from an asylum, a man inadvertently wins a cake that contains microfilm wanted by a Nazi spy ring.

title: Phantom Lady
description: A secretary tries to find the mysterious woman who can provide an alibi for her boss, who has been sentenced to death for murder.

title: Dragon Seed
description: A peaceful Chinese village is invaded by the Japanese Army, forcing a family of farmers to choose between collaboration and resistance.

title: The White Cliffs of Dover
description: An American woman travels to England in 1914, marries an aristocrat, and lives through two World Wars while waiting for her loved ones to return.

title: A Canterbury Tale
description: A British soldier, an American GI, and a Land Girl join forces to solve a bizarre mystery involving a 'Glue Man' in a Kent village.

title: The Curse of the Cat People
description: The young, lonely daughter of Oliver Reed befriends the spirit of his deceased first wife, who helps her navigate her own imaginative world.

title: Christmas Holiday
description: A soldier meets a singer in a New Orleans nightclub who tells him the dark story of her marriage to a convicted killer.

title: The Lodger
description: A landlady in turn-of-the-century London suspects her new lodger might be Jack the Ripper.

title: Kismet
description: A wily beggar-magician in ancient Baghdad schemes to get his daughter married to a Prince while wooing the Queen of the Grand Vizier.

title: The Three Caballeros
description: Donald Duck receives a birthday gift package from his friends in Latin America, leading to a musical tour of the continent.

title: Up in Arms
description: A hypochondriac elevator operator gets drafted into the army and smuggles his girlfriend onto the transport ship.

title: The Princess and the Pirate
description: A cowardly actor on the run tries to save a princess from a notorious pirate while disguised as a gypsy.

title: The Seventh Cross
description: Seven prisoners escape from a Nazi concentration camp in 1936; the commandant vows to execute them and erects seven crosses, one for each man.

title: Cobra Woman
description: A girl is kidnapped and taken to a secret island where her evil twin sister rules a cult that worships a giant cobra.

title: It Happened Tomorrow
description: A reporter meets a mysterious man who gives him tomorrow's newspaper, allowing him to scoop stories but also predicting his own death.

title: None But the Lonely Heart
description: A Cockney drifter returns home to help his dying mother run her thrift shop and gets involved with a local gangster.

title: Bathing Beauty
description: A songwriter enrolls in a women's college to win back his estranged swimming instructor fiancée.

title: Ali Baba and the Forty Thieves
description: The son of the Caliph of Baghdad, raised by thieves after his father's murder, returns to reclaim his city from Mongol invaders.
